Text: Planet Earth Live:  Each show runs 90 minutes plus an intermission, featuring the highlights from the television series "Planet Earth" in a full high definition screening with live orchestra and narration.

<Text: Planet Earth Live:  The tour which was originally scheduled to visit Dallas, Atlanta, Chicago and Los Angeles, has added performances in Philadelphia and the Baltimore-Washington, D.C. area.>
